title: Font Used on Oprah Magazine
content:
Does anyone know what font is used on Oprah's magazine, i.e. the "O" as well as the caption beneath of "THE OPRAH MAGAZINE"? What would you suggest as the most similar fonts to hers that are available in Word? Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OprahMagazine_5026.jpg)
author: YourCover Mama

comments.content: The cover typefaces look like Vectora by Adrian Frutiger. Closest match in Word app would be Franklin Gothic. The O is some kind of Bodoni. Closest match for THE OPRAH MAGAZINE in Word would be Gill Sans.
Thank you - I appreciate your taking the time to help me out.
Does anyone know what font is used for the inside of the magazine? To be more specific, the articles.
